base.name: LoopCounter
base.description: Acts as the (i=0;i<N;i+=increment) feature of a typical for loop.

parameter_definitions.name: start_value
parameter_definitions.description: The value the counter starts at, e.g. for(i=value; ...

parameter_definitions.name: end_value
parameter_definitions.description: The value the counter stops at, e.g. for(i=0;i<value ...

parameter_definitions.name: increment
parameter_definitions.description: The value the counter steps by, e.g. for(i=0;i<N,i+=value) ...
